videos.description: West Virginia steals the ball and it gets to Sagaba Konate for the two-handed slam.
videos.headline: West Virginia turns steal into a dunk

videos.description: Illinois' Jalen Coleman-Lands blocks the shot which leads to a transition layup.
videos.headline: Illinois strong defense leads to points

videos.description: Off a steal, West Virginia's Esa Ahmad takes the pass and slams it home.
videos.headline: West Virginia turns a steal into a dunk

videos.description: West Virginia's James Long tips it in as time expires in the first half to give the Mountaineers a 48-29 lead over Illinois.
videos.headline: West Virginia tips it in as time expires in the first half

videos.description: Breaking down West Virginia's physical play against Illinois
videos.headline: Breaking down West Virginia's physical play against Illinois

videos.description: West Virginia forward Nathan Adrian deflects Illinois' inbounds pass and sends the ball between his legs with his back to his teammate.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (WVU's Adrian deflects an inbounds pass, turns into trick pass) 2016/11/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: WVU's Adrian deflects an inbounds pass, turns into trick pass
